statements: SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, scan_date FROM iris_scan_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT id, scan_date, user_id FROM iris_scan_data ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, scan_date FROM iris_scan_data WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY scan_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, user_id, scan_date FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_date >= '2021-01-01' AND scan_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM iris_scan_data WHERE iris_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS scan_count FROM iris_scan_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE iris_data LIKE '%pattern%' ORDER BY user_id ASC, scan_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE iris_id = 1;
SELECT iris_id, person_id, scan_result FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_result = 'pass';
SELECT scan_time, person_id FROM iris_scan_data WHERE person_id = 3 ORDER BY scan_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT scan_result FROM iris_scan_data;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_log WHERE anomaly_type = 'security';
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data ORDER BY scan_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_result = 'Valid' AND person_id = 123 ORDER BY iris_id ASC;
SELECT iris_id, person_id, scan_result FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_time BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-04-30' ORDER BY iris_id DESC;
SELECT iris_id, COUNT(*) AS scan_count FROM iris_scan_data GROUP BY iris_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY scan_count DESC;
SELECT iris_id, anomaly_type, COUNT(*) AS total_anomalies FROM iris_scan_data JOIN anomaly_log ON iris_scan_data.iris_id = anomaly_log.iris_id GROUP BY anomaly_type ORDER BY total_anomalies DESC;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data;
SELECT scan_result FROM iris_scan_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT scan_result, scan_timestamp FROM iris_scan_data;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT audit_id, query_text FROM audit_trail WHERE execution_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT scan_result FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_result LIKE '%malware%';
SELECT id, scan_result, scan_timestamp FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT log_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_logs WHERE anomaly_type IN ('Security Breach', 'Data Leakage');
SELECT * FROM audit_trail ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data;
SELECT iris_scan_result, scan_timestamp FROM iris_scan_data ORDER BY scan_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT anomaly_type FROM anomaly_detection;
SELECT user_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT MAX(audit_timestamp) AS latest_audit_timestamp FROM security_audit;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data ORDER BY scan_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT iris_scan_result FROM iris_scan_data WHERE scan_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY detection_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT audit_id, audit_type FROM security_audit WHERE audit_timestamp < '2022-08-01' ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action_performed LIKE 'Login%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data;
SELECT user_id, username, email, last_login FROM user_data;
SELECT log_id, scan_timestamp, result_details FROM scan_logs ORDER BY scan_timestamp DESC;
SELECT emp_id, emp_name, department, designation FROM employee_data WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT audit_id, audit_timestamp, auditor_name, anomaly_description FROM security_audit LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM iris_scan_data WHERE anomaly_detected = true ORDER BY scanned_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, username FROM user_data WHERE last_login > current_timestamp - INTERVAL '1 month';
SELECT emp_name, department, designation FROM employee_data WHERE manager_id IS NULL;
SELECT audit_timestamp, auditor_name, anomaly_description FROM security_audit WHERE anomaly_description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT log_id, scan_timestamp, scan_type, result_details FROM scan_logs WHERE scan_type = 'malware_scan' ORDER BY scan_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
